about_the_game:
Background:After the last successful capture of the group of demon spirits sealed in the ancient scrolls, the defiant ones have started a new way of evil, using beauty and illusion to lure people into the scrolls and then seal them completely, causing the world to fall into chaos again. As the guardian of the scrolls, you have to work harder this time to reseal the demon spirits in the scrolls, maintain the normal order of humans and demon spirits, and reach a perfect harmony.
But always remember, be careful, they are not as easy to get along with as they seem!
Game description:
Players use the demon refining pot to successfully attach the naughty demon spirits to the ancient scrolls to win and successfully unlock and collect different types of beautiful demon spirits.
Use the left mouse button to control the demon refining pot to make it bounce reasonably and successfully repel enemies.
Game Features
In the game, you will experience.
- Strong oriental features
- Interesting and difficult game levels
- 10 CGs to get
- One click to skip
